input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response B: This garden mount weathervane from Good Directions is not only functional, but it's also a stylish decoration for your outdoor space. The flag design is made of 14 gauge steel and finished with an antique copper coating that will age beautifully over time. The sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement, so you can always know which way the wind is blowing. This weathervane comes with a 60 in. mounting rod so you can easily install it in your garden.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: I don't think the prompt was very clear about what the chatbot needed to do. However, the chatbot interpreted the intention behind the prompt and provided an acceptable product description summary.
